title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Lambda Managed Instances: EC2 Power with Serverless Simplicity (CNS382)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Lambda 托管实例：具备无服务器简便性的 EC2 强大功能 (CNS382)
abstract: AWS Lambda Managed Instances enables you to run Lambda functions on your choice of EC2 compute. With Lambda Managed Instances, you can optimize the performance and cost efficiency of your functions by utilizing specialized EC2 instance types and EC2 pricing benefits, while maintaining the familiar Serverless programming model and benefits like automatic patching and scaling. This session will provide an in-depth overview of how to get started with Lambda Managed Instances and a behind-the-scenes look at how Lambda manages and scales your instances to ensure a seamless serverless experience.
abstract_cn: AWS Lambda 托管实例使您能够在您选择的 EC2 计算上运行 Lambda 函数。通过 Lambda 托管实例，您可以利用专用的 EC2 实例类型和 EC2 定价优势来优化函数的性能和成本效率，同时保持熟悉的无服务器编程模型和自动修补、扩展等优势。本次会议将深入介绍如何开始使用 Lambda 托管实例，并从幕后角度展示 Lambda 如何管理和扩展您的实例以确保无缝的无服务器体验。
